pages.title: Badge
pages.text: Not only kirakira decorations, but also the currency among otakus.$(br2)Obtain the badge from unopened badge packets that can be found in loot chests, by trading with the villagers, or - of course, by trading with your friends!

pages.title: ...Magic?
pages.text: In a life-or-death moment, tightly holding onto your oshi's badge - perhaps this intense love can help sustain the will to survive, even if just a little?
